Detailed Description

Class VoiceMemoAudioDevice
This class is used for recording and playback of voice.
The voice memo functionality can be used in both Stand-by and Tch26 mode. The mode is defined as a parameter in the starting methods. In Stand-by, it is possible to record from the microphone and playback to the earpiece. In Tch26 mode it is possible to record and playback both in uplink and downlink direction.

Note: Do not use audio interface given by the *AudioDevices* header files as they are outdated and will be removed.

VM mode.

Enumerator:
VmModeStandby  The voice memo shall be recorded in Stand-by mode.
